mapper.sql: a.id, a.parent_id AS "parent.id", a.parent_ids as parentIds, a.name, a.href, a.target, a.icon, a.seq, a.is_show, a.permission, a.remarks, a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_at, a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_at, p.name AS "parent.name", a.level
LEFT JOIN sys_menu p ON p.id = a.parent_id
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.parent_id AS "parent.id", a.parent_ids FROM sys_menu a WHERE a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND a.parent_ids LIKE #{parentIds} ORDER BY a.seq
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_menu( id, parent_id, parent_ids, name, href, target, icon, seq, level, is_show, permission, create_by, create_at, update_by, update_at, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{parent.id}, #{parentIds}, #{name}, #{href}, #{target}, #{icon}, #{seq}, #{level}, #{isShow}, #{permission}, #{createBy.id}, #{createAt}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateAt}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_menu SET parent_id = #{parent.id}, parent_ids = #{parentIds}, name = #{name}, href = #{href}, target = #{target}, level = #{level}, icon = #{icon}, seq = #{seq}, is_show = #{isShow}, permission = #{permission}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_at = #{updateAt} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE sys_menu SET del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_DELETE} WHERE id = #{id} OR parent_ids LIKE '%,'||#{id}||',%' '%,'+#{id}+',%' CONCAT('%,', #{id}, ',%')
